Bio

I am passionate about people, products and their intricate societal interactions. As a designer I seek creative ventures that will allow me to apply analytical and technical design skills within an interdisciplinary team to develop engaging products.

I've lived in Bogot√°, Colombia; Topsfield, Massachusetts; Ottawa, Canada; and Barcelona, Spain and have learned to communicate fluently in German, Spanish and English along the way.

Complementing a background in industrial design, I pursued a minor in "Technology, Society and Environmental Studies" at Carleton University (Ottawa, Canada). It was an eye-opening and very rewarding experience by providing some perspective on contemporary issues in innovation and work, environmental sustainability, product life cycle analysis, energy use and the philosophy of technology.
